website_summaries.verdict: Well-balanced club that allows you to swing naturally for maximum performance.
pros: Club face design keeps the ball on track and minimizes a slice or hook from a mis-hit
Face is reinforced to ensure you receive maximum ball speed and distance
cons: Some golfers find this club design delivers more loft than they want

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best fairway wood out there in my opinion. Sets up nice. Love the flexibility of adjusting loft and draw.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not an Authentic Callaway Epic Flash 9 Wood
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit item. This club is supposed to have an adjustable hosel. As you can see in the photo it does not. The club head looks like an Epic Flash Star, but is not marked as such. I gave this 2 stars so the review would be seen. It seems that the 1 star reviews are hidden and cannot be read.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get ball in air
customer_reviews.text: Great fairway wood I ever hit. The 3 and 7 are amazing and easy to hit with
customer_reviews.author: SPAPEN

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father but he LOVES it. He says they are the best clubs
customer_reviews.author: alynne

customer_reviews.title: Good performance
customer_reviews.text: I got Ladies right hand Epic Flash driver and Wood 3 from Callaway preowned. I’m so happy with this purchase. They came at the time in perfect condition, the driver had a minor scratches on the bottom, but wood was as a new. Would recommend to anyone. Price for two was less then for brand new driver same brand 😉
customer_reviews.author: sholpan

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Club gets over the water not in it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dietra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I added the Epic flash 3 wood after adding Epic flash driver to my bag. Added 20 yards to my 3 wood distance. The club is also scary straight. Miss hits still end up on the target line I want to play. Great off the tee on the shorter par 4's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No head cover
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up in good condition. Original packing. Somebody tore open the bag before it was packed in the box and took the head cover. This is an issue with the fulfillment center not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great Fairway Wood
customer_reviews.text: I hit this long and straight when i put a good swing on it. My misses aren't as bad as my older 3W and my good shots are even better.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Maigatter

customer_reviews.title: club
customer_reviews.text: had fed x problem and supplier took care of it, still learning the club to early to say if I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Twiggs

customer_reviews.title: Callaway epic three wood
customer_reviews.text: My experience was awful with Amazon. The shaft was a stiff and I need a regular, so I tried to replace it and the replacement was wrong also. I stressed this with the Amazon agent on the phone but it still happened again. So both were returned.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf 2019 Epic Flash Fairway Wood
feature_bullets: Flash Face creates a new fairway wood face design that promotes increased ball speed for longer distance.
A Forged 455 Carpenter steel construction combines with Face Cup technology to deliver fast ball speed across the face for distance on center- and off-center hits.
Callaway Epic Flash Fairway Woods are designed to help all golfers get more ball speed and distance, lrf by Flash Face Technology.
Jailbreak Technology incorporates two internal bars that stiffen the body, placing more impact load on the face for fast ball speed.
New OptiFit Hostel is shorter and lighter, and the saved weight is used to reposition the CG for easy launch and high, long-carrying flight.
